187.name: Real GDP at chained PPPs in 2011 US$ (Penn World Table 9.0 (2016))
187.datasetName: Real GDP at chained PPPs in 2011 US$ - Penn World Table 9.0 (2016)

source.name: Penn World Table 9.0 (2016)
source.additionalInfo:
Expenditure-side real GDP at chained PPPs, to compare relative living standards across countries and over time. It is the ratio of the 'rgdpe' and 'pop' series.

More detailed information about this dataset can be found in the source documentation at: http://www.rug.nl/research/ggdc/data/pwt/v90/what_is_new_in_pwt90.pdf

1620.datasetName: Death rate from ambient PM2.5 air pollution - State of Global Air (2017)

1628.name: PM2.5 concentration (State of Global Air (2017))
1628.description: Particulate Matter (PM2.5) population-weighted concentration by country (1990-2015)
1628.datasetName: PM2.5 concentration - State of Global Air (2017)
1628.s_name: PM2.5 concentration- State of Global Air (2017)

source.name: PM2.5 concentration- State of Global Air (2017)
source.dataPublisherSource: Global Burden of Disease Study 2015. IHME, 2016
source.additionalInfo:
Data is gathered based on a combination of air quality observations from satellites combined with information from global chemical transport models, and available ground measurements. Global exposure to PM2.5 is then systematically estimated based on blocks or grid cells covering 0.1° x 0.1° of longitude and latitude (approximately 11 km x 11 km at the equator).

Taking into account the population in each block within a country, this data is then aggregated as estimated exposure concentrations to national-level population-weighted averages for a given year.
